entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow changing to snow this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
